sentences.en: Class the books in this category.
Intravenous drug users are in a high - risk category for hepatitis C.
sentences.cn: 静脉注射毒品的人是患丙型肝炎的高危人.

sentences.en: Isabel inclined to range herself in the last category.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔则倾向最后一类人.

sentences.en: Music shops should arrange their recordings in simple alphabetical order, rather than by category.
sentences.cn: 音像店应当按照简单的字母顺序而不是依类别来摆放唱片。

sentences.en: Over the decade, women in this category went up by 120%.
people in the over-45 age category
Seats are available in eight of the ten price categories .
sentences.cn: 座位共有10种票价，现有8种可售。

sentences.en: Students over 25 fall into a different category .
Such an atmosphere could hardly come under the category of home life.
sentences.cn: 这种气氛很难称为家庭气氛.

sentences.en: The judges could not decide which category it belonged in.
sentences.cn: 评委们无法判定它属于哪一类。

sentences.en: There are the people who speak after they think and the people who think while they're speaking. Mike definitely belongs in the latter category.
sentences.cn: 有些人开口之前会三思,而有些人想到什么就说什么.迈克绝对属于后者.

sentences.en: These questions may be included in the same category.
sentences.cn: 这些问题可以归入一类.

sentences.en: This book clearly falls into the category of fictionalised autobiography.
sentences.cn: 这本书很显然属于自传体小说。

sentences.en: This play comes under the category of critical realism.
sentences.cn: 这个剧本属于批判现实主义.

sentences.en: This system puts the top hotels in a special deluxe category.
sentences.cn: 这种分类法把最高级的旅馆列为特殊豪华级.

sentences.en: What are the implications of category - specific Undo in a nontext program?
sentences.cn: 分类撤销对于非文本程序来说意味着 什么 ?

sentences.en: Which category does this item fall under?
sentences.cn: 这一项目应归入哪一类?

sentences.en: Williams’ style does not fit easily into the category of jazz.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯的风格不能轻易归入爵士乐的范畴。

words.tran_cn: 绝对的（名词categoricalness，副词categorically，异体字categoric）；直接了当的；无条件的；属于某一范畴的
分类；分门别类；编目方法

phrases.tran_cn: 产品类别；产品目录；积范畴
同类范畴；分类范畴；分类项目

trans.tran_en: a group of people or things that are all of the same type
